name: mikroe.click.nvsram
short_description: nvSRAM Click is a compact add-on board that contains the most reliable nonvolatile memory. This board features the CY14B101J, a 1-Mbit nvSRAM organized as 128K words of 8 bits each with a nonvolatile element in each memory cell from Cypress Semiconductor. The embedded nonvolatile elements incorporate the QuantumTrap technology and provide highly reliable nonvolatile storage of data.
